title: How can attaining self-control and understanding time lead to success?
first_phrase: In the final 200 tokens of the text, the author delves into the second part of their method for achieving self-control, which focuses on saving and controlling physical and nervous energy. They divide the means of achieving this into two classes: general means for simplifying thoughts and actions in daily life, and specific rules for saving energy during periods of action. The author emphasizes the importance of this part of the method, as it can reform the mentality of most individuals if applied effectively. Overall, the text offers practical guidance for attaining greater self-awareness and control over one's actions and energy.
content: In the first part, therefore, we will highlight the means which can gradually lead us to gather energy in such a manner as to avoid undertaking any dispersive act, as well as not to utter any useless word or articulate any useless thought. However “negative” it might be, this part of the method is equipped with such a degree of importance that — if it is applied well — it might be sufficient to reform the mentality of nearly all of us. focusing the mental side – assuming control over the emotional side Simplifying thought The means that are devised in order to accomplish that purpose are of two classes. The first kind gathers the general variety of means, those relating to the way life as a whole is carried out. Through their help, we might simplify our acts, our thoughts, and, accordingly, our own existence. The second class applies to specific rules which have been studied under the first type, and teaches how to save the physical and nervous energy we shall require whenever the time to act comes.
last_phrase: In conclusion, by focusing on the mental side, simplifying our thoughts, and accessing our intuition, we can reform our mentality and take control of our lives. By understanding time and gaining mental clarity, we can effectively exercise our free human choice and utilize the energy we have saved to pursue our positive goals.
